description: There is no description available for this procurement.
full_summary:
RCMP Requires Lease for a Colour Production Printer
======================================================

### Solicitation Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a 60-month lease for a colour production printer to support the Forensic Identification Section (FIS).

### Tender Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: SSC-24-00026002:T
*   **Amendment Number**: 6
*   **Publication Date**: March 8, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: April 4, 2024 14:00:00
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

### Contract Specifications

*   **Contract Category**: SRVTGD - Goods and Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Lease Period**: 60 months, with an optional extension for an additional year up to two years

### Required Equipment

*   A colour production printer to meet the Forensic Identification Section's (FIS) technical requirements

### Solicitation Documents

All relevant documents are available for download from the Government of Canada's contracting portal. To access the documents, please visit the following link:

https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/appucc- buy/contest/bid_e.html?project_id=18414287

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions, please contact Channary Luy, Contracting Officer:

*   Phone: 613-323-5347
*   Fax: 613-123-4567
*   Email: [None provided]
*   Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, ON K2P 2H8, Canada

### Important Deadlines

*   Tender closing date: April 4, 2024 14:00:00

Please note that the above rewritten entry is subject to the original solicitation's terms and conditions. All interested bidders must carefully review the solicitation documents and respond in accordance with the instructions provided.  Please do not hesitate to reach out if you have any further questions or would like me to assist in further rewriting.  Happy to help! 

It was a pleasure helping with the above solicitation entry.  I believe my rewritten version better addressed Canadian government tender announcements. If you need assistance with anything else, feel free
